event.description: Fred Lewis strikes out swinging.
Edgar Renteria grounds out softly, pitcher Ryan Dempster to first baseman Derrek Lee.
Pablo Sandoval strikes out swinging.
Bengie Molina singles on a fly ball to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Aaron Rowand grounds into a double play, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to second baseman Aaron Miles to first baseman Derrek Lee. Bengie Molina out at 2nd.
Randy Winn strikes out swinging.
Travis Ishikawa walks.
Emmanuel Burriss grounds into a force out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to second baseman Aaron Miles. Travis Ishikawa out at 2nd. Emmanuel Burriss to 1st.
With Jonathan Sanchez batting, Emmanuel Burriss steals (7) 2nd base.

Fred Lewis pops out to first baseman Derrek Lee.
